text:
@narendramodi @DGCAIndia sir we need full refund for our cancelled flight due to covid19 lockdown 3.0 from 4th may. We want refund in cash not credit shell, please help us out by issuing a notice regarding this ...plz
#RefundPassengers #Lockdown3
